name: MuscleTech Essential Series Platinum Fish Oil - 100 Capsules
description:
MuscleTech Platinum Fish Oil - 100 Capsules

MT - Superior Science. Superior Results.

MuscleTech Essential Series delivers all your favorite ingredients and products with the best science, taste and value. Essential Series products are staples for every athlete, with no frills and no fillers - just products you can trust backed by the best brand in sports nutrition!

Many supplement companies don't fully disclose their ingredients. They also don't invest in science, research or quality control. At MuscleTech, a portion of every dollar spent on supplements is allocated towards funding scientific research. This means you can trust Essential Series for superior quality and results, as is the MuscleTech promise.

Ultra-Pure Omega-3s

Platinum 100% Omega Fish Oil uses only the most ultra-pure filtered fish oil to supply the key omega-3 fatty acids in fish oil docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) and eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA Platinum 100% Omega Fish Oil soft gels give your body the EPA and DHA it needs to be its very best.

No Fishy Aftertaste

An enteric coating on the delicate soft gels prevents premature breakdown and helps you avoid the fishy aftertaste or bothersome fish burps you may get with lower quality fish oil products!

‡ MuscleTech is America's #1 Selling Bodybuilding Supplement Brand based on cumulative wholesale dollar sales 2001 to present.
short_description:
MuscleTech Platinum Fish Oil – 100 Capsules

  • 100% Pure Fish Oil
  • Enteric Coated Soft Gels
  • No fishy aftertaste
  • Contains total 350 mg of Omega 3 fatty acids.
  • Country of Origin: United States

name: Now Foods Omega-3- Soft gels
description:
Now Foods Omega-3 Cardiovascular Support - Softgels

Supportive but not conclusive research shows that consumption of EPA and DHA Omega-3 fatty acids may reduce the risk of coronary heart disease.The fish oil concentrate is manufactured under strict quality control standards. It is tested to be free of potentially harmful levels of contaminants such as PCB's, dioxins, mercury and other heavy metals.

Suggested Use

Take 2 softgels twice daily with food.

Other Ingredients

Softgel capsule [bovine gelatin (bse-free), glycerin, water] and d-alpha tocopherol.

Contains fish (anchovies).

d-alpha tocopherol from soy.
Not manufactured with yeast, wheat, gluten, corn, milk, egg or shellfish ingredients. Produced in a GMP facility that processes other ingredients containing these allergens.

name: GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil softgel 60 cap
description:
GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil

Key Features

  • GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil is a rich source of Omega 3 fatty acids and helps to provide 1500 mg of Omega 3 fatty acids with 900 mg of EPA+DHA per serving
  • These high quality softgels can also provide support to joint and skin health
  • GNC Fish Oil Softgels can also assist in maintaining normal blood pressure and support healthy cholesterol levels
  • Enteric coated fish oil supplement from GNC also assists in the prevention of fishy burps

 

Product Description

 

GNC Fish Oil is a dietary supplement, which comes loaded with the benefits of omega 3 fatty acids. Consuming these softgels on a regular basis can help you reap the benefits of Omega 3 fatty acids, which includes EPA and DHA as the active ingredients. GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil delivers 1500 mg of total Omega 3 fatty acids with 900 mg of EPA / DHA (540 mg EPA and 360 mg DHA) per serving.

As per Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR), it is important to consume minimum of 250 to 2g of EPA and DHA daily to gain the health benefits. (ICMR, 2010). Each serving of GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil will provide 1500 mg of total Omega-3 Fatty Acids with 900 mg of EPA/DHA (540 mg EPA and 360 mg DHA per serving).

Regular intake of Omega-3 fatty acid is highly recommended and beneficial right from the first day of your life i.e. during pregnancy, kids, teens, and older age. It is essential fatty acids which if taken on a regular basis can prevent serious health problems and complications! EPA and DHA, being the active ingredient of omega-3 fatty acids plays a different role at different life stages.
